Entries.Peeta: $1I painted a bunch of the eggs. Hope you like them.
Entries.Peeta_y2: $1I love painting eggs with the kids. Their patterns are so funky.
Entries.Peeta_spouse: $1I painted an egg just for you babe. See if you can find it!

Entries.Peeta: Hey @! I've never been to something like this. Honestly, I don't have great memories of dancing...
Entries.Peeta_y2: I'm kind of glad I don't have to dance. Stuffy suits and an audience? No thanks.
Entries.Peeta_spouse: $13Want me to spin you around babe?#$e#$14We can have our own dance, just the two of us.

Entries.Peeta: $17I put a Cheese Bun in there....will that taste good? They're good on their own.
Entries.Peeta_y2: $17I still don't understand this festival. I just put in some Spiced Milk this time.
Entries.Peeta_spouse: $1I put in a whole loaf of Raisin and Nut Bread. I hope the Governor likes soggy bread!

Entries.Peeta: $16Moonlight jellies?#$b#$17Sounds like something the Capitol would cook up...
Entries.Peeta_y2: $1I can't wait for the jellies. They're so pretty. Nothing to be afraid of!
Entries.Peeta_spouse: $8Hey sweetheart. I named one of the jellies after you.#$e#$1Of course I can tell which one it is!

Entries.Peeta: I put some pastries in Gus's display.#$e#$1He said he'll split the profits with me if we win!
Entries.Peeta_y2: $11I hope Mayor Lewis lets me have my own display sometime.
Entries.Peeta_spouse: $1Can I put my cake in your display?#$b#$1Pleeease?#$e#$7Kidding love. You don't need my help to win.

Entries.Peeta: $23*Gulp*. I'm not sure if I'm a fan of this festival.#$b#$24Some of these...things...really look like mutts.
Entries.Peeta_y2: $2I tried to dress up this year cause Jas and Vincent wanted to play 'renaissance'.#$b#Penny's teaching them a lot!#$e#$1How did I do?
Entries.Peeta_spouse: $3Promise you'll hold my hand if I try the maze?

Entries.Peeta_y2: $17You think Pam will sell me one of her fish?#$e#This is making me hungry, honestly.
Entries.Peeta_spouse: $1I'll be in charge of dinner tonight. Kick some fish ass!

Entries.Peeta: $1Want a Winter Star cookie? Baked by yours truly!
Entries.Peeta_y2: $1Jodi gave me a new set of cookie cutters, and Evelyn knitted me oven mitts!
Entries.Peeta_spouse: $14All I want is a kiss from you babe.
